meta.title: Which word is more intense?
meta.description: Choose the word that you think indicates a greater change.
meta.disclaimer: You are participating in a study being performed by researchers in the MIT Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Lab. If you have questions about this resarch, please contact zoya@mit.edu. Your participation in this research is voluntary. You may decline further participation, at any time, without adverse consequences. Your anonymity is assured; the researchers who have requested your participation will not receive any personal information about you.

instructions.simple: Given two adjectives, click on the one that you think indicates something larger, more drastic, or more significant, particularly when inserted into the phrase 'a _______ change'.
steps: You will be shown two words at a time.
Select the adjective that you believe describes a LARGER change by clicking on it.
You will be shown 30 pairs of words total.
